Detailed Description

Models the situation where a customer is having their items checkout out by a cashier. 

 CheckoutEvent:
  deQ self from Q
  T self -> CustomerDepartureEvent @ t+ceil(items/speed)

Member Function Documentation

void CheckoutEvent::action (  )  [inline, virtual]

called when this event "happens".

The customer removes themself from the line and triggers a DepartureEvent for the time at which they will be done checking out.

Implements Event.
